item.title: Code and compile error. Please read. Working with a ingame Highscore table
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

Okay, I have this code for my Highscores

//In-game highscores
public int playerRank = 0;

public void resetRanks() {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
server.ranks[i] = 0;
server.rankPpl[i] = “”;
}
}

public void highscores() {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@dre@hootyScape In-Game Top 10 Highscores", 8145);
for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to display more, simply the number you want it to display, say 20 = for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
if(server.ranks[i] > 0) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rank “+(i+1)+”: @red@"+server.rankPpl[i]+ "@bla@ - Total Level:@whi@ " +server.ranks[i], 8147+i);
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
resetRanks();
}
//end highscores

**But, when I add that in like anyother public void table() I get this compile error:
client.java:2864: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable ranks
location: class server
server.ranks = 0;
^
client.java:2865: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable rankPpl
location: class server
server.rankPpl = “”;
^
client.java:2874: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable ranks
location: class server
if(server.ranks > 0) {
^
client.java:2875: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable rankPpl
location: class server
sendQuest("@bla@Rank “+(i+1)+”: @red@"+server.rankPpl

  • “@bla@ - Total Level:@whi@ " +server.ranks, 8147+i);
    ^
    client.java:2875: cannot find symbol
    symbol : variable ranks
    location: class server
    sendQuest(”@bla@Rank “+(i+1)+”: @red@"+server.rankPpl

  • "@bla@ - Total Level:@whi@ " +server.ranks, 8147+i);

                                    ^

5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

What do I need to add to my server.java or what do I need to add at all to get this to work?

Read full topic
